nodes.text: The Denarii Nebula was a large nebula in the Gordian Reach. It was the remnant of a double-star supernova millennia before the Battle of Yavin. The Junction-Tierell Loop circumnavigated the nebula. Scouts had struggled to find a stable route between the worlds of Pinoora and Presbalin, on opposite sides of the Denarii Nebula. Denarii Station was located within the nebula.
